scripts.start: echo 'Starting static server' && python3 -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || python -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || echo 'Python not available, serve files manually'
scripts.dev: python3 -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || python -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || echo 'Development server: Open index.html in browser'
